project.Title: Austin's Mod
project.ItemDescription:
The goal of this mod is to reduce some of artifical difficulty imposed by inventory management and curve the difficulty with minor rules and character balances.
## Rules Changes * Affliction/Virtue chance is now 50/50 chance from 75/25 * Stress reduction from killing blow is now 5 from 3 * Stress reduction chance on killing blow is now 80% from 50% * Stress reduction from critical hit is now 5 from 3 * Stress reduction chance for compansions on critical strike is now 80% from 25% * Stress damage at lower light levels is slightly lower (-5 at all levels not 0) * Player crit chance at lower light levels now matches monster crit changes increases (0, 1, 2, 3, 5)
## Heroes Hellion * slightly increased damage for all weapon upgrades
Grave Robber * lunge accuracy increased by 5% at all levels * blight damage from posion darts is increased to 2, 3, 4, 5, 6
Occultist * Wyrd Reconstruction now has a minimum heal of 1, 1, 2, 2, 3
Highwayman * Point Blank Shot now has accuracy increased by 5% at all levels
HoundMaster * Hound's Harry now does slightly more bleed [1, 1, 2, 2, 3] -> [1, 2, 3, 3, 4] * Howl now has 100% chance to hit nut stress reduction was lowered from [2, 3, 4, 5, 6] -> [1, 2, 3, 5, 5] * Howl now also applies a stress reduction buff with values [-5%, -6.5%, -8%, -9.5%, -11%]
## Inventory * Portrait stack increased to 6 * Bust stack increased to 8 * Crest stack incrased to 14 * Deed stack increased to 8
* Trapezohedron stack increased to 3 * Pewrelic stack increased to 3
* Holy Relic stack increased to 3 * Grain sack stack increased to 3
* Torch stack increased to 16 * Provision stack increased to 24
## Campaign * Level 2 dungeons now accept resolve level 3 Heroes * Level 3 dungeons now accept resolve level 4 Heroes * Level 4 dungeons now accept resolve level 5 Heroes
